Package controller

Class TrainingCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.TrainingCtrl

  • public class TrainingCtrl
extends java.lang.Object

    This controller class processes user's request for learning new recipes

    Since:
    2018-04

        Parameters:

      • selectIngredient

        public boolean selectIngredient​(java.lang.String input)
        Method to select / remove ingredients to selection
        Parameters:
        input - this is the string input by the user
        Returns:
        a boolean of the user's input validity, prompt user for valid input if false

      • addSelection

        public void addSelection​(char selection,
                         int quantity)
        Add selected ingredient into the member's selection
        Parameters:
        selection - this is the index of the ingredients available (member's inventory)
        quantity - this is the quantity to be added into the selection

      • removeSelection

        public boolean removeSelection​(char selection,
                               int quantity)
        Remove selected item from current selection
        Parameters:
        selection - the index representing the ingredient selected
        quantity - the quantity of the removed ingredient
        Returns:
        true if it is successfully removed; otherwise return false

      • learnRecipe

        public boolean learnRecipe​()
        Learn a new recipe by the member and add that recipe to the member recipe list
        Returns:
        true if the member successfully learns a new recipe; otherwise return false.
